content: CFS-S SIL GG Firestop silicone sealant Silicon-based fire caulk, providing a highly flexible firestop seal for construction joints and pipe penetrations ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Sealants, sprays and coatings- - - ### FEATURES:Features Smoke-, gas- and water-resistant Designed to adhere well without primer Applications Expansion or stretched-connection joints in fire compartment walls and floors Pipe, cable or duct penetrations through fire compartment walls and floors For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: LEED VOC: 48 g/l Base materials: Concrete, Masonry, Metal, Gypsum Application temperature range: 35 - 104 째F Technical Data | LEED VOC | 48 g/l | Base materials | Concrete, Masonry, Metal, Gypsum | Application temperature range | 35 - 104 째F | Approx. cure time | 4 mm/3 days | 1 | Can be painted | No | Color | Red, White, Grey | at 75째F/24째C, 50% relative humidity ### ITEMS- 2077322 - FS sealant CFS-S SIL GG foil grey - Package Size 15 pc - 2076881 - FS sealant CFS-S SIL GG cart red - Package Size 1 pc - 2076882 - FS sealant CFS-S SIL GG foil red - Package Size 15 pc - 2076883 - FS sealant CFS-S SIL GG pail red - Package Size 1 pc - 3505837 - FS sealant CFS-S SIL GG case of 30 tubes - Package Size 1 pc - 3505839 - FS sealant CFS-S SIL GG 600ml foil 4 cases - Package Size 1 pc - 3505840 - FS sealant CFS-S SIL GG 600ml foil 4 cases & 1 disp - Package Size 1 pc - 3505842 - FS sealant CFS-S SIL GG 5 gal 12 pails - Package Size 1 pc - 3505838 - FS sealant CFS-S SIL GG 310ml 15 Cases of 30 Tubes - Package Size 1 pc - 3506113 - FS sealant CFS-S SIL GG 5 gal 18 pails - Package Size 1 pc - 3505841 - FS sealant CFS-S SIL GG 600ml foil 35 cases - Package Size 1 pc - 2076729 - FS sealant CFS-S SIL GG foil white - Package Size 15 pc
